job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description:
Selby Jennings is working with a Dallas based investment manager on an incredibly exciting opportunity. They are looking to bring on ML/Data Engineers with a focus on Natural Language Processing and building ML algorithms.


You'd be one of the first hires in their Data Innovation and Insights team giving you the opportunity to take ownership and make a tangible impact on the firm. Further details to come upon your application.


What you have:

  • 1-5 years of experience
  • Strong programming experience in Python
  • Extensive experience in Natural Language Processing
  • Knowledge of regressions, classification algorithms, decision trees, random forests, and neural networks
  • Data scrubbing/cleaning experience
  • Knowledge of data streaming, Tensorflow, Spark, Kafka, and AWS are nice to have
